description:
Brook hears Big Mom`s plan firsthand as she shares her intentions with Pudding in front of him! Meanwhile Big Mom`s agents believe most of the Straw Hats to be under control, but doubt besets Montd`Or.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Deciding to Say Goodbye! Sanji and His Straw-Hat Bento!
Die endgültige Entscheidung! – Sanji und sein Strohhut-Picknickkorb!
Décision d`adieu. Sanji et le bentō des Mugiwara
Wakare no Ketsui: Sanji to Mugiwara Bentou
Решив попрощаться! Санджи и его Мугивара-бенто
قرار الوداع! سانجي وبينتو قبعة القش
別れの決意 サンジと麦わら弁当
